function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate understanding of human movement patterns","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mismatch of measures and locations for disease elimination","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient targeted operations for identifying and managing asymptomatic and symptomatic infections","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate and untimely creation of risk maps for elimination programmes","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of capacity to rapidly provide diagnostically confirmed malaria incidence in very low transmission environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in credit guarantee ratio during the emergency stage of covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Establishment of regional credit guarantee scheme in asean","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of consideration of social risk in policy development","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Varying credit guarantee ratios for different countries and banks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased credit guarantee ratios in asean member states due to covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in accessing finance for smes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High loan default risk ratio npl/l","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of npl/l increase in the ’emergency stage’ due to unpredictable negative shock to gdp","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differential behavior of banks in the ’new normal’ stage in response to gdp reduction","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Magnitude of bank responses in the ’exit stage’","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Unanticipated shock to macroeconomic variables leading to negative or positive responses for npl/l","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on gdp growth affecting npl/l of banks in asean countries","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transition through different stages of the pandemic affecting gdp and in turn npl/l of banks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accumulated response of npl/l to variable shocks in singapore banks","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of unpredictable shock to gdp on npl/l in philippines banks","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Response of npl/l to shocks in malaysia banks","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of var approach without considering contagious diseases impact","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unanticipated exogenous shock in the model","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Impact of macroeconomic variables on npl/l without considering health-related factors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-stationarity of the series, as indicated by the kpss test.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of long-run linkages between macroeconomic variables and bank profile components.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High npl/l ratios in asean countries","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent credit guarantee ratios for banks","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reliability of econometric equations","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close proximity of people during data analysis and discussion.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of shared resources and facilities for conducting analysis.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Empirical analysis based on pca and cluster analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Calculation of soundness based on financial variables","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Preliminary tests for kmo and bartlett tests","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of common opinion on variables for calculating the soundness of banks","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Direct impact of banks’ financial performance on their soundness","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of statistical techniques for categorizing banks based on creditworthiness","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate credit guarantee ratio in a recession","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data for all asean member states","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Novelty of the study","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Risk of financial default","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex model formulation","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Empirical study based on theoretical model","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex loan demand equations may lead to incorrect loan assessments and allocations.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate equilibrium loan amount calculations may result in under or over-financing of small and medium enterprises smes .","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-optimal credit guarantee ratio determination may increase the risk of loan default and financial losses.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete understanding of optimal credit guarantee ratio in the banking industry for sme loans in asean countries during and after covid-19 crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Moral hazard resulting from adopting the same credit guarantee ratio for all banks","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete modeling of the credit guarantee ratio may lead to suboptimal policy decisions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of appropriate lending technology for credit-rationed smes","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
